description:
Rokudo attempts to help his school`s top delinquent, Osanada, turn over a new leaf. But redemption is never easy, especially when the biggest student gang in Japan comes calling.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dokomademo Tsuzuku Shiawase na Kaerimichi Da
The Happy Road Home That Goes On Forever
Un chemin sans fin, rempli de bonheur !
どこまでも続く幸せな帰り道だ
